puzzle.title: Forest for the Trees
puzzle.hint:
The labels for each row are:
- 11 SLANG TERMS FOR UNITED STATES CURRENCY - 9 DEAD MUSICIANS - 5 MEMBERS OF ONE DIRECTION

The matching items in each row are:
- Bread, Cabbage, Cheddar, Clams, Dough, Lettuce, Bones, Smackers, Stacks, Fins, and Spondoolie. - Duane Allman, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Hank Williams, Jimi Hendrix, Jerry Garcia, Buddy Holly, John Bonham, Jim Morrison, and Otis Redding. - Harry, Zayn, Louis, Niall, and Liam.

This grid can be divided into 2x3 sections, which should remind you of the braille symbols on the Puzzled Pint Code Sheet.
The final answer is a 10-letter proper name.

puzzle.title: Stuck in the Middle with You
The Song Remains the Same (US variant, Bonus Puzzle)
The Song Remains the Same (UK variant, Bonus Puzzle)
